alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:16PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Manatee, western Charlotte, southwestern DeSoto and Sarasota Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 715 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Myakka River State Park to 7 miles southwest of Southeast Arcadia. Movement was southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Port, Punta Gorda, Port Charlotte, Myakka River State Park, Charlotte County Airport, Murdock, Gulf Cove, South Venice, Nocatee, Tropical Gulf Acres, El Jobean, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland, Warm Mineral Springs, Lake Suzy, Solana, Hidden River, Nokomis, and Venice Gardens. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Sarasota; DeSoto; Inland Charlotte; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
